articles.title: New Feature: Responsive Emails
articles.summary: We've added support for responsive layouts in our email templates. Now your emails will look great on any device!

articles.title: Email Client Compatibility
articles.summary: Our framework now checks compatibility with popular email clients like Gmail, Outlook, and Apple Mail to ensure your templates work everywhere.

articles.title: Hot Reloading Support
articles.summary: The new development environment supports hot reloading, making it faster than ever to develop and test your email templates.
